body:
#### PR description:

* Allow different order of the solids in the XML definition

#### PR validation:

```
cmsRun DetectorDescription/DDCMS/test/python/testGeometry2021FromDB.py
```

title: DD4Hep: DDDetector from DB - allow to delay a Solid Definition
